name: LinkLikeComponentProps
description:
In React version this interface extends React.HTMLProps<HTMLAnchorElement>
but in Vue version we don't need to extend any interface because we can use
useAttrs method

members.name: external
members.description: Makes the link open in a new tab

members.name: download
members.description: Makes the browser download the url instead of opening it. Provides a hint for the downloaded filename if it is a string value.
